attributes.action: Require police carry tranquiliser guns and ban use of police firearms on animals
attributes.additional_details: Sedating an animal is much more ethical than shooting them. Shooting animals or pets can cause a lot of anger, trauma and distress in the community. We think this is also detrimental for the police and their community relations.
attributes.background: Please require that the police have tranquiliser guns and training for the safe sedation of animals. Make it law that police firearms cannot be used on dogs and other animals.
